pli-tv-bi-vb-pc32:2.3.2: [Sp.2.940](): _Vavatthānaṃ dassetvāti majjhe kāsāvaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantīnaṃ anāpattīti attho_, “_Vavatthānaṃ dassetvā_ means there is no offense for those who lie down after putting an ochre cloth, a staff, or even a belt in the middle.”
